ItemName.SourceString: Melee Hit Streak Break Spark Burst
ItemName.LocalizedString: Melee Hit Streak Break Spark Burst

ItemDescription.SourceString: Hitting an enemy 4 times with this weapon reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-151 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 4 seconds.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Hitting an enemy 4 times with this weapon reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-151 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 4 seconds.
